title: Hunter Point Capital Picks Up Stake in Iron Park Capital
sub_head: The firms share a common heritage going back to GSO Capital Partners, now part of Blackstone
body:
Hunter Point Capital is taking a minority stake in Iron Park Capital Partners, an investor in public and private credit markets.
Two executives behind the pair of New York-based firms share a common link: GSO Capital Partners, which Blackstone Inc. acquired in 2008 and turned into its private credit platform.
